## Scope
The scope of this privacy policy is related with the Magasin Documentation Site with the URL http://unicef.github.io/magasin (Site)

This privacy policy does not cover the GitHub repository (https://github.com/unicef/magasin) and other external pages related with magasin.

## Purpose
The purpose of collecting the data is to create statistics about the number of visits, to improve the documentation and the product itself.

## Personal data collected
The personal data that is collected is:

* IP address
* Browser 
* Operating system
* Screen size
* Pages visited within the site
* Time spent in the site

## Cookies
The only cookie that the Site uses is for collecting the statistics.

## Sharing the collected data
* The personal data collected by UNICEF is kept in UNICEF's servers and is not shared with any other third party.
* The personal collected data is only accessible by internal magasin team which is composed by UNICEF staff members.
* UNICEF may share annonymized data for reporting purposes.

## Third party hosting

The Site is hosted under [GitHub Pages Service](https://docs.github.com/en/pages). 
Please visit [https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/privacy-policies/github-privacy-statement](https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/privacy-policies/github-privacy-statement)
